item.title: ‘Ultra-violent fast-paced first-person shooter’ PIGFACE announced for PC
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/05/ultra-violent-fast-paced-first-person-shooter-pigface-announced-for-pc

  • PC

To what lengths will you go to prevent someone from spilling your darkest secrets?

Publisher DreadXP and solo developer titolovesyou have announced PIGFACE, an “ultra-violent” and fast-paced first-person shooter about blackmail. It will be available for PC via Steam. A release date was not announced.

Here is an overview of the game, via DreadXP:

About

You are Exit, a terrible woman who has done terrible things and now it’s time to do worse things for someone even more terrible than you. They know what you’ve done and they don’t mind using blackmail to turn you into their gun-for-hire. Complete missions to expand your arsenal by purchasing equipment from the Black Market. Unlock and use a variety of masks, each granting a different set of abilities to allow you to tailor the experience to your gameplay style. Will you charge in, guns blazing, or focus on stealth and cunning? Ultimately it doesn’t matter as long as you Get The Job Done.

  • ❮
  • ❯

Key Features

  • It’s Blackmail… – They know what you’ve done and now they have a job for you. Complete combat sandbox style missions to earn money, expand your loadout and get closer to whoever’s pulling the strings.
  • Armed to the Teeth – Purchase Weapons, Armor, and Equipment from the Black Market.
  • Wear Different Faces – Find and unlock a variety of masks that grant you a suite of different abilities.

Watch the announcement trailer below. View a set of screenshots at the gallery.

Publisher Announce Trailer

item.title: Tales of the Shire: A The Lord of the Rings Game physical edition announced for PS5, Switch
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/05/tales-of-the-shire-a-the-lord-of-the-rings-game-physical-edition-announced-for-ps5-switch

  • PS5
  • Switch

Due out alongside the digital release on July 29.

iam8bit will distribute a physical edition of single-player life simulation game Tales of the Shire: A The Lord of the Rings Game for PlayStation 5 and Switch day and date with its digital release on July 29, publisher Private Division and developer Weta Workshop announced. Pre-orders are available now at iam8bit.

The game will be available in the following two editions:

  • Retail Edition ($39.99) – Available via general retailers and iam8bit
    • Includes a beautiful 20″ x 16″ fold-out map for the quaint village of Bywater
    • Pre-order now and receive a download code for the official game soundtrack
  • iam8bit Exclusive Edition ($39.99) – Only available via iam8bit (PS5, Switch)
    • Includes an exclusive book cover o-sleeve
    • Includes a beautiful 20″ x 16″ fold-out map for the quaint village of Bywater
    • Pre-order now and receive a download code for the official game soundtrack

Tales of the Shire: A The Lord of the Rings Game is due out for for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, Switch, and PC via Steam on July 29.

Watch a new trailer below.

Physical Edition Announce Trailer

item.title: Double Dragon Gaiden: Rise of the Dragons free DLC characters Jeff and Abore now available
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/05/double-dragon-gaiden-rise-of-the-dragons-free-dlc-characters-jeff-and-abore-now-available

  • PC
  • PS4
  • PS5
  • Switch
  • Xbox One
  • Xbox Series

Six new fighters to be added later in 2025.

Double Dragon Gaiden: Rise of the Dragons free downloadable content characters Jeff and Abore are now available, publisher Maximum Entertainment and developer Secret Base announced. The content marks the first of several planned character updates, with an additional six new fighters to be added later in 2025.

Here is an overview of each character, via Maximum Entertainment:

Jeff

A childhood rival of the Lee brothers, Jeff trained alongside them in the martial art Sōsetsuken. But as his skills lagged behind, jealousy grew. Determined to surpass Billy and Jimmy, Jeff abandoned his noble path and embraced the streets, merging Karate with Sōsetsuken to develop a dangerous, unpredictable fighting style.

Abore

A massive ex-soldier with a stoic demeanor, Abore fights with raw power and unwavering calm. His incredible strength and resilience have led some to wonder: is he a man, or something more? The quiet brawler offers no answers, only crushing blows.

Double Dragon Gaiden: Rise of the Dragons is available now for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Switch, and PC via Steam.

Watch a new trailer below.

DLC Characters Jeff and Abore Launch Trailer
